title: Azure AD MFA
description: Azure Active Directory Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) to provide two factor authentication across the enterprise.

title: TruU Passwordless
description: TruU Passwordless to provide a smooth login experience to users on their laptops, RDP and SSH sessions.

title: Enterprise Vault
description: Enterprise Vault is SaaS product implemented in the enterprise to store and retrive secrets, generic passwords, key-vaults etc..,

title: Optimus
description: Developed an inhouse application for a lifesciences client which is responsible in managing the clinical trials and budgeting of the trials to develop medicine.

title: DoAccelerate
description: DoAccelerate is an application built on Machine Learning Model to generate CRF's and ELS's based on the uploaded Clinical Research Document.

title: Optimus-GEMS Integration
description: Integration of a new application called GEMS with an existing application Optimus for inbound and outbound data
